scripts.build:content: npx tsx generate-data-and-routes.ts && npx prettier --config prettier.config.js --write src/content/detail-pages-content.ts src/routes/detail-pages-routes.ts
scripts.build:data: tsc --module es6 --skipLibCheck --outDir dist/assets src/routes/detail-pages-routes.ts src/content/detail-pages-content.ts && tsc --module es6 --skipLibCheck --outDir dist/assets src/routes/routes.ts src/content/content.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:content && npm run build:csr && npm run build:data && npm run build:ssr && node generate
